events.message: I received the wrong item and would like to request a refund since this was not what I ordered.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's message about receiving the incorrect product.
Assigning customer case to refund specialist team to handle the request promptly.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. I'm sorry to hear you received the wrong item. Let's get this sorted out for you.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order number? This will help us process your refund quickly.
Here is the photo of the incorrect item and my order number is 54321. Please let me know the next steps for the refund.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund immediately and send you a return label to ship the wrong item back at no cost.
Thank you for your prompt response and the refund offer; I appreciate the quick handling of this issue.
Your refund is being processed and the return shipping label has been emailed to you. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to ensure you received the refund and the return process went smoothly. Please inform us if you have any further questions.
Since your refund has been completed and the issue is resolved, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us.
